intro: Critesion geniculatum, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its unique, zigzag-shaped stems and small, fleshy leaves that help it conserve water. It produces clusters of small, yellowish flowers that bloom in spring. Due to its distinctive appearance and adaptability to arid environments, it is often cultivated as an ornamental plant.
